Saitama's monolog about lack of emotion remanded me of Halo lore about AI
"No more sadness. No more anger. No more envy."

There was this idea in Halo lore that AI can only persist for so ling before basically breaking down into an existential crisis of purpose.
I think the established length of tie was 7 year lifespan for an AI.
